alert.note: Alert for Echols (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 3:06PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Suwannee, western Hamilton and southwestern Echols Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 305 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Quitman to 8 miles northwest of Dowling Park. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Live Oak, Jasper, Jennings, Suwannee Springs, Suwannee River State Park, Dowling Park, Blue Springs, Crossroads, Newburn and Houston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
